name: Access Request Decision for Other
description: Sent to a user when access was requested for them by another user and the reviewer of that request has made a decision.
subject: ${requesterName}'s Request for Access for you was #if($approved)approved#{else}denied#end
body:
Dear ${user.name},

On ${dateRequested}, ${requesterName} requested ${requestedObjectName} for you.

#if ($approved)

Your access has been approved. The system is now processing the request.

#if ($removeDate)

Your access to ${requestedObjectName} is scheduled to end on ${removeDate}.

#end #{else}

Your access has been denied.

#if ($reviewerComment)

${rejecterName} included the following comment when denying the access: $reviewerComment

#{else}

Please contact ${rejecterName} if you have any questions.

#end #end

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
